title: [MINDSET] Ep. 112 How To Experience More Joy w/ Agapi Stassinopoulos
description:
Do you hesitate to step into your light?

This week Ash talks with Agapi Stassinopoulos, a best-selling author, inspirational speaker and Thrive Global Facilitator, all about the pathway to being unapologetically bold.

Do you dream of walking into a room filled with fearless presence? Being bold in this manner isn’t an easy feat, but it is something that can be learned, and it all starts with understanding what gifts you have to give to the world.  Agapi shares her process of understanding your talents, building confidence, finding radical self-acceptance and how to do it all with grace. Listen in as Agapi shares the ultimate mindset tip to be fearless when meeting new people.

Agapi and Ash talk through ways to overcome negative thought patterns around success and build the life you want.  Agapi brings spunk and a vibrant personality like we’ve never seen before, you don’t want to miss this. As always, be sure to stick around for Ash’s post-episode notes!

 

Resources:

Unbinding the Heart: A Dose of Greek Wisdom, Generosity, and Unconditional Love by Agapi Stassinopoulos

Wake Up to the Joy of You: 52 Meditations and Practices for a Calmer, Happier Life by Agapi Stassinopoulos

 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  1. The difference between joy or happiness, and talent or recognition.
  2. Three ways to know you are not alone.
  3. How to move into radical self-acceptance.

 

Where to Find Apagi:

http://wakeuptothejoyofyou.com/

Instagram: @agapistassinopoulos

Facebook: Agapi Stassinopoulos

Email Agapi for 4 free meditations: apapi@unbindingtheheart.com

 

Promotion:

Ready to discover the best career path for you? Visit YouTurnPodcast.com/clarity
